content.rendered:
CCVCL Lab Members

[ A picture of lab members /collaborators during a NeARabl presentation]

[A picture of the lab members over zoom during 2020-2021 academic year)

Director

  • Professor Zhigang Zhu (CUNY City College and Graduate Center)

Faculty and Collaborators

  • Professor Hao Tang (Borough of Manhattan Community College and Graduate Center, CUNY)
  • Ms Jin Chen, CTO, NeARabl, Inc.
  • Arber Ruci (CEO, NeARabl, Inc., Director of the NYC Innovation Hot Spot, Entrepreneur-in -Residence and National Faculty for the NYC Regional Innovation Node, and Industrial Advisor and Co-PI of the NSF PFI Project SAT-Hub)
  • Professor Huy Vo (CS/CUNY City College and ASRC; CUNY Graduate Center)
  • Professor Jie Wei (CS/CUNY City College; CUNY Graduate Center)
  • Professor Tony Ro (Neuroscience/CUNY Graduate Center)
  • Professor Zihao Zhang (Spitzer School of Architecture, CCNY)
  • Professor Jie Gong (Civil and Environment Engineering, Rutgers)
  • Dr. William H. Seiple (Chief Research Officer, Lighthouse Guild)
  • Celina M. Cavalluzzi (AVP, Goodwill NY/NJ)
  • Dr. Zheng Yi Wu (Director of Applied Research, Bentley Systems, Inc.)

Graduate Research Assistants

  • Xuan Wang (CS PhD Program at CUNY Graduate Center)
  • Yaocheng Wu (CS PhD Program at CUNY Graduate Center, with Prof. Huy Vo) [ on leave now]
  • Jin Chen (DSE Graduate at CCNY, CTO at Nearabl)
  • Bilal Abdulrahman (CS PhD Program at the CUNY Graduate Center)
  • Jianing Qi (CS PhD Program at the CUNY Graduate Center, with Prof. Hao Tang)
  • Lizheng Zhou (CS PhD Program at the CUNY Graduate Center, with Prof. Hao Tang)
  • Jiawei Liu (DSE at CCNY, with Prof. Hao Tang)
  • Gong Qi Chen (DSE at CCNY, CS PhD Program at CUNY Graduate Center, with Prof. Zhigang Zhu, Prof. Zihao Zhang and Prof. Yana Kucheva)

Undergraduate Research Assistants

  • Matthew Munoz (CS, CCNY, with Prof. Zihao Zhang and Prof. Zhigang Zhu)
  • Kelvin Wu (CS, CCNY, with Prof. Hao Tang)

Former Lab Members

Post Docs and Visiting Faculty

  • Professor Lidong Chen (Visiting Professor)
  • Professor Yufu Qu (Visiting Professor, PostDoc)

Graduate Students

  • Greg Olmschenk (joined NASA as a postdoctoral fellow)
  • Farnaz Abtahi (first joined WorkFusion as a Research Scientist, now a Machine Learning Engineer at Facebook Reality Labs)
  • Feng Hu (joined Nvidia as a Senior Engineer)
  • Wai L. Khoo (now the Solution Architect, Nonprofit at Traction on Demand, was a Senior Project Manager and Acting Director, Technology at Center for Court Innovation, and Senior Technical Project Manager, Girls Who Code)
  • Wei Li (joined Amazon as a Research Scientist)
  • Edgardo Molina (joined CUNY Tech Prep as Lead Instructor)
  • Rui Li (was a Visiting PhD Student)
  • Hao Tang (joined BMCC/CUNY and now a Full Professor)
  • Tao Wang (joined BAE Systems and now a Principal Scientist)
  • Andreas Michael (DSE at CCNY, with Prof. Hao Tang)
  • Bilal Abdulrahman (Data Science at the CUNY Graduate Center)
  • Edward Heronzy (Data Science at the CUNY Graduate Center)
  • Nick Karkut (Computer Engineering at CCNY, with Prof. Zihao Zhang in SSA at CCNY)
  • Steven Alsheimer (Data Science at the CUNY Graduate Center, now a Data Scientist with Canon)
  • Xingye (Alex) Li (DSE at CCNY, will be a Software Engineering in Machine Learning at Lyft)
  • Hao Nan Ou (DSE at CCNY, with Prof. Jie Gong at Rutgers; joined NAVAIR as a Data Scientist)
  • Lei Zhang (Baruch College, with Prof. Hao Tang)
  • Nur Deniz Turhan (DSE at CCNY, with Prof. Hao Tang)
  • Santosh Suwal (DSE at CCNY, with Prof. JR Rizzo at NYU)
  • Mengting Xia (CS at CCNY)
  • Ling Zhang (joined Amazon AWS)
  • Yaohua Chang (joinedCAE- the Chinese Aeronautical Establishment)
  • Yi Feng
  • Martin Goldberg
  • Yu-Chi Hu
  • JianHong Li
  • Weihong Li
  • Bing Shen
  • Yifeng Wang
  • Jing Ye
  • Scott Yu
  • Li Zhao
  • Hui Zhu
  • Deepak Karuppiah (UMass-Amherst)

Undergraduate Students

  • Ai Hua Li (CS, CCNY)
  • Ziyi Huang (CS, CCNY)
  • Richard Yeung (CS, BMCC, with Prof. Hao Tang)
  • Kelvin Wu (CS, CCNY, with Prof. Hao Tang)
  • Aaron Altamirano (Computer Graphics and Imaging, Lehman College, with Prof. Hao Tang)
  • Jin Chen
  • Tyler Franklin
  • Atsuko Sakurai
  • Xing (Victoria) Yang
  • Maui Arcuri
  • Francisco Martinez
  • Hanssel Hinojosa

  • Frank Palmer
